Text:
Aslamu-Alaikum,

I hope everyone is well.  This has very good picture and sound quality.  This is also the complete version. I am currently seeding this as much as I can.

Brilliant effort.

Thank You
Pakistani Dragon

Wa-Alaikum-Aslam

Aslamu-Alaikum,

I forgot to mention one other thing which is that it is in Urdu with optional English subtitles. These can be switched on or off on the VLC Player.

Thank You
Pakistani Dragon

Wa-Alaikum-Aslam
